mapper.select: SELECT S.STU_ID ,S.STU_CARD_DATE ,C.COCO_STTS AS COCO_STTS ,P.NM AS STU_NM ,P.BRDT AS STU_BRDT ,P.RDNMADR AS STU_RDNMADR ,P.ZIP AS STU_ZIP ,P.DADDR AS STU_DADDR ,P.MBTLNUM AS STU_MBTLNUM ,P.EML AS STU_EML ,P.PROFL_PHOTO AS PROFL_PHOTO ,CASE P.SEXDSTN_CD WHEN 'M' THEN '남' WHEN 'W' THEN '여' ELSE '알 수 없음' END AS STU_SEXDSTNCD FROM STUDENTCARD S INNER JOIN COMMON_CODE C ON(S.COCO_CD = C.COCO_CD) INNER JOIN PERSON P ON (S.STU_ID = P.ID) WHERE STU_ID = #{stuId, jdbcType = VARCHAR}
